name: Color Climb (ProtonDev, Rhaskia, kalelovil)
description:
A multiplayer survival game where you and up to 10 friends must parkour your way up a large obstacle course while outrunning the rising lava!

How to play:

In the menu you can press the matchmake button, which will look for any existing servers to join or create your own if there are none, you can see the amount of players in a room and a host can begin the game at any point by pressing the F key, you will then spawn with all the other players into a map where you can move around and jump up a large parkour course, while lava rises underneath you. If you are the last player standing, you win!

Keyboard Controls:

  • Left - A
  • Right - D
  • Jump - G
  • Host start game - F

IMPORTANT:

We failed to fully combine all our ideas in the time limit, so the 1st download is a version made for multiplayer, while the second (currently hidden) has the color switching mechanics that were intended for multiplayer.  Please note that due to lack of time, we uploaded the second build with multiplayer also, but it is very broken, more than 1 player playing the second build will be very buggy, so please proceed with caution :D
